item.title: MIUI V13.0.15.0.RLDCNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 12X China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12X China

Codename: psyche

Version: V13.0.15.0.RLDCNXM | 11.0

Size: 4.0 GB

MD5: fb4835c8a49f12e894ed1dfb8ff482c5

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2022. Increased system security.
[Camera]
Fix: Camera app force closed in some cases when front camera was used
[Gallery]
Fix: Photos couldn't be viewed in Gallery in some cases
[Other]
Optimization: Auto brightness
Fix: Device couldn't be fully charged in some cases

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
